name: Conjunction Assessment Analysis
tagline: Fortran code to be integraded with OrbFit
body:
### Welcome to Conjunction Assessment Page.
This is a piece of software to be integrated with the [OrbFit software](http://adams.dm.unipi.it/orbfit/OrbFit/doc/help.html).
It reads a catalogue of objects and systematically excludes pairs that are not at risk of conjunction. It has been tested with a fictitious population of space debris in Low-Earth orbit and with real data of objects from the NORAD website.

### Procedures
After compiling the source code, go on the test folder and try:
````
$ ./chain_order.sh 0
$ ./filter_sequence.x
````

If you want to try the TLE catalogue, try instead:
````
$ ./cubesats_ephemerides.sh
$ ./filter_sequence.x
````

You can also have a look at one evolution and its interpolation. Just type:
````
$ ./Utest_table.x
````

### Authors and Contributors
Many contributors, not in GitHub.

### Reporting bugs
Please contact me for any bug or problem.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
